attributes.action: MAKE USE OF PEOPLE IN PRISON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to make use of all the lives kept in prison, for example minor offenders could be used to make roads etc. and be paid very little so at least when they leave prison they will have some money to start life again and not be tempted by crime due to poverty. So instead of just paying our taxes to keep people in prison we could make use of them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
